description:
Honerva develops a Beastman she hopes is capable of repelling the “Four Head Lion Attack” named Omega Subgar. To distract the GoLion team, a wave of killer space frogs is unleashed on Altea terrorizing the people. The Lions must take on the frogs before facing the Beastman itself. Will the frogs croak or will GoLion choke?
Source: crunchyroll
